taxon.author: O. Pickard-Cambridge, 1882
taxon.distribution: Seychelles, India, India, Sri Lanka, Bangladesh, Myanmar, Thailand, Philippines, China, Japan. Introduced to Seychelles, Hawaii

referenceObject.reference: Pickard-Cambridge, O. (1882c). On new genera and species of Araneidea. Proceedings of the Zoological Society of London 50(3): 423-442, Pl. XXIX-XXXI.
